sentences.en: Air can be pumped into the diving suit to increase buoyancy.
sentences.cn: 可以给潜水衣充气以增大浮力。

sentences.en: His personal buoyancy and vigour were a tonic.
sentences.cn: 他本人非常乐观,精力也很充沛,令人感到鼓舞.

sentences.en: I admired his buoyancy and persistent good humor.
sentences.cn: 我很欣赏他轻松快乐的样子以及一贯的幽默作风.

sentences.en: I'll have to take stock, go carefully and regain my buoyancy.
sentences.cn: 我将不得不审时度势，小心行事，同时保持乐观。

sentences.en: Jose Mourinho floats my boat with more buoyancy than Beckham ever could.
sentences.cn: 何塞-穆里尼奥如同海上浮标带领我的小船扬帆远航,而贝克汉一辈子都无法做到.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the dollar's buoyancy is much less pronounced elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 美元在其它地区反弹力度要小得多.

sentences.en: Oil floats on water and so you get the buoyancy or lift.
sentences.cn: 油是漂浮在水上的,这样,潜艇就有了浮力.

sentences.en: Participant should put on standard lifejacket or buoyancy aid throughout the competition.
sentences.cn: 赛员必须在整个赛事穿著合标准之救生衣或助浮衣.

sentences.en: Salt water has more buoyancy than fresh water.
The buoyancy of groundwater makes adverse effects to stability of foundation.
sentences.cn: 地下水的浮力对基础的稳定有不利的影响.

sentences.en: The likelihood is that the slump will be followed by a period of buoyancy.
sentences.cn: 萧条过后经济有可能会出现一段时期的繁荣。

sentences.en: The primary forces causing migration of hydrocarbons are buoyancy and capillarity.
sentences.cn: 引起碳氢化合物运移的主要作用力是浮托力和毛细力.

sentences.en: Then she had been pale and sad but there had been a buoyancy about her.
sentences.cn: 那时她尽管面黄瘦,但还显和比较轻松活泼.

sentences.en: There was a buoyancy in their atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活环境里有一种轻松愉快的感觉.

sentences.en: To move with lightness and buoyancy.
VHF Doppler Radar Observations of Buoyancy Waves Associated with Thunderstorms, 1984 J . Atm . Sci.
sentences.cn: 雷达和微波辐射计测雨特性比较及其联合应用,1980年大气科学.

words.tran_cn: 轻快的；有浮力的；上涨的
浮力；轻快；轻松的心情；（股票）保持高价或回升

trans.tran_cn: 浮力，（物体在液体里的）浮性，（从失望、噩耗等中）恢复正常的能力，（价格、营业状况等的）维持力
trans.tran_en: the ability of an object to float
